description: Get ready for hours of fitness fun with Junior Fitness Trainer. Explore the sunny Junior Fitness island resort filled with 10 exciting beach aerobic activities.

name: K11: Kommissare im Einsatz
description: Slip into the role of a young inspector who is new to the K11 team and solve five exciting and tricky cases under the guidance of inspectors Rietz and Naseband. Experience the thrill of a real investigator in a world full of intrigue and lies and try to uncover the truth against all odds. Investigate crime scenes with the typical technical tools of a modern investigator. Rely on your judgment as you sit in the interrogation room with both yourselves and suspects and only through skillful interrogation can you get them to reveal their most secret thoughts.

name: Kid Paddle: Lost in the Game
description: Kid Paddle: Lost in the Game is a 3D platform game inspired by Midam's comic strip Kid Paddle. Kid Paddle and his friends go play games at the City Game Arcade, but things turn sour when they become trapped inside the game and Kid Paddle's friends are being held captive by the evil blorks. Kid Paddle must journey through four different worlds to save his friends by activating switches, jumping on platforms and fighting many different blorks. It's also possible to play as Little Barbarian and save the princess in two of the game's six worlds.

description:
The Evil Elves have stolen Santa's Christmas presents and hidden them in their Terrible Toy Shop!
Help Santa save Christmas by finding all of the presents for the good little girls and boys!

name: The Magic Roundabout
description: The Magic Roundabout is the direct videogame adaptation from the popular TV show for kids, recently remade in CGI. It's Friendship Day, a celebration invented by the waggish Zebedee. At this occasion, he promises Dougal a wonderful gift if he succeeds in helping all the other people in the village. So does begin Doogal's adventure.

name: Joe Biden For The PS2 2: Re-elected
description: A mod for Super Mario World.

name: Mahjong Party Pack
description: Experience Mahjong in the next generation and play a variety of exciting and tricky Mahjong adventures with up to four players. Find matching mahjong stones and free up the game boards, whether alone, in a team or against each other - in the three varied game variants is guaranteed no boredom.

name: Kenny's Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm-kei - Nissan Note Original Version
description: A version of The World of Golden Eggs: Nori Nori Rhythm-kei made to advertise the Nissan Note vehicle.

name: Wi-Fi Taiou: Gensen Table Game Wii
description: Wi-Fi Taiou: Gensen Table Game Wii is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Winning Eleven Play Maker 2010: Aoki Samurai no Chousen
description: World Soccer Winning Eleven 2010: Aoki Samurai no Chousen is a Sports game, developed and published by Konami, which was released exclusively in Japan in 2010.

name: We Sing Deutsche Hits 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Football 2
description: Leave the rules of football behind you. Play on improvised fields in the middle of the city and use the environment to your advantage. Walls and objects can be used to play your opponent. Everything is possible in street football without a coach! Take part in exciting competitions and exciting games and become the first world champion in street football!

name: The Studio 100: Play Island
description: The Studio 100: Play Island (or Het Studio 100 Speeleiland) is a collection of games based around popular characters such as Studio 100's K3, Kells, Maja the bee and Amika. The game can be played by everyone together in the same style as the immensely popular WiiSports. Whether played by children, children with one parent, or with your grandmother, everyone has fun. In short, a true party game!

name: The Saddle Club
description: After the books and the TV series, here's the videogame! This adventure game will allow the players to meet all the characters who made the success of the series, but also gives them the opportunity to realize their greatest dream of becoming a member of The Saddle Club!

name: The Tower of Tears
description: The Tower Of Tears is a survival-horror game set in a mysterious labyrinthine architecture. Explore this strange and vast place to carve your way out or find the source of the tears. You are not alone and danger is lurking. Use wisely every tools available to stay alive...

name: The Sweetest Ring
description: The Sweetest Ring is a short linear NTR visual novel about meeting and dating a ghost woman until she discovers there is better dick to be found by crawling back into the very TV she came from and joining the professional porn stars inside!

name: The Puzzle of Blocks
description: Infinite challenges, millions of innings with different levels of difficulty.

name: The Forgotten Village of Gondomayit
description: Kinan, a Yogyakarta native, became a civil servant and was posted to Gondomayit Village in remote Central Java. Here, electricity is scarce, and locals depend on traditional lighting. Evenings are quiet due to the lack of illumination.

name: The Paper Aircraft of Childhood
description: How far can a childhood paper airplane fly.?

name: Unlimited
description: Forget the track, skip the turns, and discover what 'speed' really means with Unlimited.

name: Unexpected Consequences
description: Three years after tragedy struck twice, your new roommates reignite your desire for life, leading to unexpected revelations about your past and a long overdue reunion with one of your oldest and closest friends. Uncover the truth and choose your path to bring those responsible to justice.

name: Thunder Jumper
description: Rocket, hook, and pound your way all across the land to destroy Motorhead's evil expansion of factories! Speedrunners beware: There is no max velocity. Can you handle the power of lightning speed?

name: Trakonius
description: A gladiator fighting for his freedom in the sands of the arena... Unaware of the prophecy, Trakonius has fallen into the arena through the machinations of the senate. Even the gods will help him in his tough battle for freedom in the name of justice, but still can he win his freedom?

name: Tribe of the Accord
description: Tribe of the Accord is a pixel-art action RPG where players take on the role of Adira. Survive, hunt, and uncover secrets in a hostile world while building a bond with Adira's father, Torion.

name: Ucube Avcıları
description: An absurd comedy-focused turn-based adventure

name: Ultrazone
description: Take control of the soldiers to guide them and restrain the enemy forces

name: Stolen Mushrooms
description: Stolen Mushrooms - a 2D platformer where you as a frog take revenge on the brazen mutants who stole your winter supplies, jumping through different levels and destroy enemies. Purchase everything you need in the in-game store and complete all levels. There should be only one left!

name: Super Shape Cascade
description: You have few seconds to put each shape in the correct place.

name: Tears of Adria
description: Tears of Adria is an immersive fantasy RPG where exploration meets unpredictability. Shape your party's destiny with randomized level-ups, face swift auto-battles, and delve into a world rich with secrets and magical items. Play either solo or with friends.

name: Terror Spikys
description: Get hired as a Cactus Hunter, explore the killer cacti infested open-world with your truck, help villagers in return for valuables and wipe out the so-called Terror Spikys.

name: Testimony of Help
description: "Testimony of Help" is an immersive short film in virtual reality (VR) that tells the heroic story of the Ulm family from Markowa - who provided aid to Jews during World War II. The project transports users to the realities of a village in the Podkarpackie region in the 1940s.

name: The Bullet Hopper
description: A rabbit find itself dead, help it gains its life back in this time limited platformer where knowledge and skills are required. To aid you in this quest, an arsenal of guns is at your disposal, employing their bullets to propel you forward and upward.

name: The Collar
description: What would it be like to be taken from your normal life and be pitted against random strangers. Would you fight and kill to survive?

name: The Cosmic Tramp
description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Moby, a curious wanderer. Traverse surreal realms, meet eccentric characters, and uncover the universe's enigmatic wonders. Each encounter offers unique stories and perspectives, expanding your understanding of existence.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Pirate Fleets
description: On the high seas, smugglers and buccaneers fight for treasure and glory. Life is cheap, and rum is even cheaper. Landlubbers in port towns dread the day that black sails appear on the horizon.

name: Station Unknown
description: As a new employee of the Station Unknown - you'll have to adapt to the new challenges of the night shift. You're on your own, manage to fulfill your shift tasks and the same time face the darkness surrounding the station. Survival-horror meets management simulator.

name: Square Edges
description: Mini arcade game about a cube jumping on moving platforms. All platforms move at different speeds. Find the right moment to make a precise jump so as not to fall off the edge. Collect tokens and gain a high rating to purchase other characters.

name: Spellbound Survivors
description: Welcome to the mesmerizing world of Spellbound Survivors, a single-player action-roguelike game! Embark on an epic adventure, conquer maps, acquire mighty powers, and gear up for an ultimate showdown with the formidable Overlord Wizard. Your destiny unfolds in this captivating journey!

name: Spark Mk1
description: Spark MK1 is a fast paced non-stop action game that will challenge your reflexes.

name: Space Station Multiverse
description: Become a crew member on a multiplayer space station and try to survive as long as possible.

name: Sonny The Mad Man: Casual Arcade Shooter
description: Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?

name: So Much Stuff 4: Bits & Bobs
description: Uncover an abundance of new stuff in this exciting sequel!

name: SchoolLife
description: Satirize some educational systems

name: SCP: Centura Tycoon
description: Rebuild the SCP Foundation, contain anomalies, and face the Chaos Insurgency. Your choices shape humanity's fate. Can you secure, contain, and protect?

name: Set Off Fireworks Together
description: Set off fireworks together, here you can experience a different feeling, you can create as much as you like in the game, combine fireworks, and pursue the taste of childhood!

name: Sex Room 3
description: Welcome to the world of virtual excitement and sexual power in the clicker generator of adulterous entertainment SEX Room 3 [18+]! Feel the depth of your power over sinful desires and start your journey to riches and fame

name: Shitting Pigeon
description: Shitting Pigeon is a 3D pigeon stealth action game and bird droppings simulator. Fly over the city, scare people and eat a lot of bread.

name: Sky Conquest
description: In short, Sky Conquest is a fun platform game to play with friends, with cute graphics and competitive gameplay. Download it for free right now on Steam and get ready to jump in and have some fun!

name: Slender: The Silent Call
description: "Slender: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself lost in a dark and menacing forest, confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets. Based on character by Eric "Victor Surge" Knudson

name: Shelter in the Doomsday
description: This game is a 2D platform game mainly focused on defense and adventure, with some storyline tasks, as well as collection and construction.

name: Project Wunderwaffe: War in Ukraine
description: Become a part of the alliance that supports the Ukrainian Army. Manage new-age weapon production and the largest modern military logistical hub. Build a strong coalition that will help Ukraine win in the shortest possible time.

name: Recordbooks
description: 'Recordbooks' is a Photorealistic bodycam first-person tactical shooter . You will play as a secret agency agent whose duty is to solve Complex and Mysterious cases of your duty area .You will need your detective and tactical skill to solve these complex cases. Get ready to show your skill.

name: Red Barrels Go Boom
description: The world is overrun with zombies! They are fast and they are immune to bullets! The only way to kill them is EXPLODING BARRELS!

name: Rogue Mech
description: Pilot your trusty Phoenix in this isometric, post-apocalyptic mecha survival game with base building elements. Trade, plant, hack, dig, talk and fight your way through the wastelands. If you survive, you might be able to restore a little green to this ash-ridden world.

name: Ruin
description: Escape the levels of Ruin in this 2D platformer with tight controls where you traverse dangerous traps and difficult obstacles.

name: My Recycling Center
description: Operate, configure and expand your own recycling center in this first-person simulator! Work fast and sort the trash. Use the compactors to destroy the bulky waste. Earn satisfaction and cash to buy new containers and unlock new trash types.

name: Motel Manager Simulator
description: Restore an old motel alongside a shop and a gas station. Design, furnish, decorate and rent rooms. provide products for customers and fuel for cars. Hire employees to help you and be the boss of your own empire.

name: Memory Rewind
description: Explore the thrilling detective visual novel adventure with your assistant Olivina. Find your way through the bizarre case that pulling you into unique investigation gameplay and meet the colorful cast of memorable characters that can help you or endanger you

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Shin-etsu Line (Naoetsu to Niigata) E129-0 series
description: Currently, the Shin-etsu Line operating as JR EAST has three sections: between Takasaki Station and Yokokawa Station, between Shinonoi Station and Nagano Station, and between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station. This DLC includes the section between Naoetsu Station and Niigata Station.

name: Kanji Combi: Yakuzumo
description: Practice and test your kanji knowledge! Drag and drop components to form the right kanji in the right place. While you learn, you help an overweight buffoon cheat his way through his first official sumo match! Some knowledge of Japanese language is required to play.

name: Kid Pilot
description: Embark on an immersive VR adventure in Kid Pilot. Soar through whimsical skies, pilot various aircraft, and conquer thrilling challenges. Ignite your imagination and experience the joy of flight in this captivating aviation journey. Get ready to take off!

name: Legends
description: "Legends" is an adventure puzzle game that parodies Chinese mythology. You will play as the protagonist "Hong-Niang," who goes to the town to buy ingredients for her parents and stop the bad guys from disrupting the ceremony.

name: Legend of the Landscaper
description: A survival roguelite set in a sprawling maze of hedges and topiary. Channel your inner swordsman to mow down fields of overgrown grass and anyone unfortunate enough to get in your way.

name: Le Corps-Glitch: Multitudes
description: In Le corps-glitch (multitudes), multiple becomings occur. It is a virtual reality experience that highlights potential and future bodies to merge with the Other, change skin, slowly morph into a hybrid being that connects with plant, animal and technological species.

name: Leave Panda Away
description: In China, there is a peaceful and beautiful country inhabited by pandas of various races. They are usually gentle and friendly, but when faced with threats, they will demonstrate strong combat effectiveness.

name: Legend of the Archer
description: Legend of the archer - the game will tell you the story of a legendary archer who finds himself in the midst of a war between two clans.

name: Legends of Savvarah: Flowers and Scorpions
description: You are Nikaria. An agent of a mysterious god, sent to another country. Does the end justify the means? Is the will of the god above the law? Is the death of a non-believer insignificant? The decision is yours alone.

name: Martha's Dolls
description: Dive into the adventures in " Merphy Town " where Martha's Dolls lives, solve the mystery, prepare yourself for a great horror experience !

name: Lovey Dovey
description: As the #1 toilet fan, you visit an abandoned toilet factory in search of the legendary golden toilets. However, you're ambushed by the factory's friendly mascot, Lovey Dovey. You're at an extreme disadvantage since the only thing you brought is a rocket launcher. Collect all 69 toilets then escape!

name: Lens Of Horror
description: Descend into the psyche of an elder known for his red hat. Is his world an illusion or a horrifying reality? Each shadow holds untold secrets, with a line blurring reality and delusion. Seek the truth, but it unveils itself only at the end. Are you brave enough to look through the Lens of Horror?

name: Luna's Adventure: The Overlord
description: A special friend to rescue. A final boss accessible from the start. A whole world to explore until you can defeat him. Risk your life to save the person most important to you in this fantasy adventure RPG in 3D and real-time combat.

name: Poon Puzzle
description: Poon Puzzle is a relaxing anime puzzle with cute horny girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality animated artworks!

name: Project Chimera
description: We will save humanity by our knowledge. We need to just immerse in this environment.

name: Prin-C01
description: An endless runner where you can control your speed. Run, trot and jump as you collect bones while avoiding speed blockers, pits and enemies. Or use your wits and turns those blockers against enemies. Play across multiple levels to beat the best score.

name: Pharmageddon
description: Journey into an otherworldly dimension, guiding opioid zombies on their quest for transcendent release in this unique strategy game.

name: Pinhole Universe
description: A game of exploration, curiosity, and fascination. Single-player, low-pressure and endless variety.

name: Pixi Poxi Autorunner Lab
description: Pixi Poxi is a challenging autorunner rage puzzle platform game that will test the limits of your gaming skills. You will accompany a test subject on their quest to escape to freedom fighting through several levels with a variety of difficulties, traps and barriers!

name: Philistine
description: Join Priam as he navigates a world that wants him dead. Help him make decisions as he’s met with trials and tribulations that never cease to antagonize him. While he has his own character, you may be surprised with how heroic, or villainous, he may be based upon the decisions you’ve made.

name: Nobody
description: Nobody, the game! Spirits, monsters and autonomous machines will attack you, military traps abandoned for many centuries will return to work with your simple presence, you will also have to face earthquakes and avalanches.

name: Operation Terra
description: Lead mankind to its new Earth in this science fiction First Person Shooter/Role Playing Game. Grab your gear and fight through hordes of hideous robots, droids and machines. Loot credits and power ups. Complete missions to unlock permanent bonuses. With procedurally generated levels and maps.

name: Nothing Left: Give Up
description: Legend has it that in the far east, there is a golden tree that produces golden fruits, and there are constantly explorers embarking on this arduous and challenging journey in search of the legendary golden tree. Explorers please be careful of the rough sea, once stepped into will never be recovered

name: Glam Pursuit
description: Enter the dazzling world of Glam Pursuit in Sunshine City. Master the unique acting system, shape your actor, and navigate the highs and lows of fame. Watch your scenes steal the limelight on the silver screen. Your path to stardom begins here!

name: Freja
description: Freja is a first-person psychological horror game with a unique approach. You take the role of a woman with PTSD and selective amnesia and must help her remember her past traumatic experiences through exploration and arcade games.

name: Freeway Nightmare
description: Freeway Nightmare - A 2D game with an overhead view, the protagonist runs forward in his dream, wielding various guns, which can be improved over time by collecting materials from killed enemies. More enemies and obstacles appear as you progress!

name: Fragment
description: A role playing game about growing plants to heal the environment in real time. Gather your crew, upgrade your ship, and build a better future for the inhabitants of the eight rings.

name: Ghost In The Mirror: Episode 1 - Here Be Dragons
description: Ghost In The Mirror is an anthology of graphic adventures. A series of ghost stories characterized by a lot of storytelling, puzzles, and wild humor. A collection of modern adventure games that still capture the spirit of the '90s games.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Stalemate on Donets
description: Izyum-Barvenkovo offensive operation of the Red Army was carried out from 17 to 27 July, 1943 by forces of South-Western Front in order to encircle and destroy the German group defending Donbass, as well to prevent the transfer of enemy troops to the Kursk region.

name: Highway Cleaners
description: The world is overrun, and your survival depends on your skills behind the wheel. Are you ready to take on the apocalypse and become the ultimate Highway Cleaner? Get behind the wheel, gear up, and let the mayhem begin!

name: Hearts of Cold: Redemption
description: Hearts of Cold is a story driven, futuristic, open world, first person-third person Shooter, set in a wide range of varied environments with fast paced, intensive action interspersed with moments of calm and adventure.

name: Grug to Future
description: Jurassic Park meets Roguelite Tower Defense: As a caveman, venture into a primal world and collect futuristic relics. Build your deck with unique cards granting powerful perks & abilities! Face dino invasions, shape your strategy, and embrace the age clash.

name: Hal_4
description: >HAL_4 is a singleplayer action-puzzle horror game. Navigate a series of anomalous environments as you solve puzzles and escape death-traps by taking them apart.

name: Hinge
description: Hinge is a psychological horror game inspired by Lovecraft and Bioshock. Explore atmospheric locations, search for clues, survive the nightmare, and discover who you are and why you're here.

name: Hitler is my crash
description: Hitler is my Crash is an absurd adventure in which you will plunge into the world of black humor and satire. You have to take on the role of a girl who is in love with Hitler and does not want to share him, and go on an absurd journey with Hitler, who is captured by saboteurs.

name: I Love Finding Wild Friends
description: Discover lovable wild animals in this thrilling hidden object game!

name: Fakeway
description: Dig, fight, collect, and explore. If you like Terraria very much, you can try this game. It will also give you a different experience.

name: Escape The Charon
description: Escape the Charon is a sci-fi adventure meant to be played in one sitting. An ancient alien artifact has been brought to the space station Charon - soon after, the Charon goes dark. James West must search for clues and solve the mystery to discover what went wrong.

name: Educational Suite
description: "Explore a world of fun and learning! Educational Suite offers engaging mini-games to help kids develop essential skills. Join the adventure now!"

name: Dystopika
description: Dystopika is a chill cyberpunk city-builder of dystopian dreams (or nightmares). No goals, no stress, no objectives. Just your imagination.

name: Drunkoff V.
description: "Drunkoff V." is a narrative game with elements of horror, telling the dramatic story of the main character. You will have to come face to face with skeletons in the closet along with him. The events unfold in the post-Soviet era.

name: Drop Doll
description: "Drop Doll" is a casual puzzle game. In this game, players earn points by combining balls of the same type.

name: DroneZ XL
description: DroneZ XL transports you to a hostile future that, because of neglect and pollution, has forced people to live immersed in feedback units. These units, which are connected to the V-Space network, are dominated by Artificial Intelligences who forbid people to disconnect.

name: Dragon's Ruler
description: This is a single-player, turn-based strategy war game set in a fantasy world. With over 130 different units, strategize to maintain a balance between governance and military strength as you aim for territorial expansion!

name: Dungeon 3D
description: The ultimate 3D Virtual Tabletop, Dungeon 3D is light-weight, incredibly easy to use, and extremely robust. It has everything you could possibly need to run full sessions, create gorgeous 3D maps, access character sheets, initiative, dice rolling, animated and customizable avatars, and so much more!

name: Explosive Madness
description: Explosive Madness is an exciting game about physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures using tools and explosives! In the game you will find many exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty.

name: Forebloomed: Evergreen Edition
description: An action rogue-like about garden plants fighting back against the hungry pests that threaten their home. Spend the day blasting through hedges to find loot, but take care to make it back before dark! Gather synergistic items, confront formidable bosses, and play as several unique characters!

name: Flex Disc Golf
description: Play countless disc golf courses throughout the world, find lost discs or buy new ones, and learn new throws and styles! Experience realistic gameplay while being surrounded by highly detailed nature.

name: Firebowl
description: FireBowl is an Arcade Multiplayer game inspired by the classics. It is set in High Fantasy world with all the classic characters such as Halflings, Wizards or... Toilets? Join the party and discover the number one sport of the Middle Ages.

name: Field of Honour
description: Field of Honour is a single-player game that combines elements of first-person shooter and strategy, set in the Napoleonic Wars. You can take command of massive battles or engage as a single soldier to defeat the enemy in various game modes.

name: Fast Equality
description: Fast Equality - A game with a choice of actions in a mathematical environment. You are given a set of certain mathematical symbols, each of which can turn the entire course of the game, both simplifying and getting the desired number, and away from it by a huge number of steps!

name: Chalice of Souls: Grahan
description: Embark on a thrilling journey with Baani, a college student with a tribal background attempting to uncover the secrets of her ancestors. When her friend Sarah is kidnapped by a murderous cult obsessed with immortality,she must confront her own sanity & fight to rescue her friend before it's too late

name: Cemetery Defence
description: Cemetery Defense is a tower defense game. Your task is to prevent the destruction of the barrier wall by installing towers and improving them for greater combat effectiveness. The number of enemy forces will only grow, but the tactical advantage will be upgrades to your towers and walls.

name: Caribbean Legend
description: An open-world RPG set in the Golden Age of Caribbean piracy. Embark on a 200-hour-long adventure, plunder cities and ships, explore the unknown, discover treasures, forge friendships, earn bounties on your head, and charm the ladies on your path to ultimate freedom!

name: Card Crafter Genesis
description: Card Crafter Genesis- Create your own card games with custom cards, decks, and rulesets! Then play them against other players online! Each card can be given custom backs, fronts, descriptions, and effects!

name: Cardboard Fish
description: Dive into the captivating world of Cardboard Fish! Experience gripping gameplay as Nozzle, the heroic fish, in a physics-based adventure filled with skill challenges and mind-bending puzzles for thrilling progress and achievement.

name: Card Battle Simulator
description: Dive into the world of customizable card games! Whether you're a player seeking new challenges or an aspiring creator, this is for you.

name: Dark City: Kyiv - Collector's Edition
description: Gather your courage for a journey into a mysterious world beyond our view in this hidden-object mystery!

name: Corvos Dynasty
description: Build your heroes, loot the kingdom, and discover rare treasures. Corvos Dynasty is an RPG inspired by old-school classics. Will you be the legendary hero who saves the princess or the conquerer who burns the monarchy to the ground?

name: Concubine
description: A sensual, hack dark fantasy ARPG. Fully customize an adorable concubine and up to three female companions with deep cosmetix details. Be the private assassin of the Sultan and earn sexy outfits, powerful weapons & mystic skills. Design & customize your harem base at the Grand Palace.

name: College Sex: Episode 1
description: A visual novel series about the sex life of two college girls. In this episode, they just arrived at their dorm.

name: Chick-Chick
description: You play as chickens who have to survive on unstable platforms in various universes of the chicken coop, will you be able to keep the balance and hold on, compete with friends and beat the record!

name: Daydream Mosaics 4: Shades of Blue
description: Join the Twin World saga's latest chapter as you dive into the mesmerizing underwater kingdom of the Azure World. Solve nonograms to restore submerged sanctuaries, and explore the tranquil beauty of the deep blue. Enjoy added challenges with hidden object, spot-the-difference, and jigsaw mini-games.

name: Daydreamy
description: Explore the imaginary worlds of Nela in Daydreamy, the indie first-person narrative adventure that takes you back to those years when everything was possible. Discover how she lost her imagination and let yours soar. Are you ready to embark on a unique adventure?

name: Decopins2
description: "Decopins 2" is a sequel to "Decopins" a Decopin-type tower defense shooting game. Use traditional Japanese finger flick -Decopin- to repel the approaching donuts. Collect EXP and money to level up your Decopins. Depending on your level, you will also be able to use magic. This time, it's tougher...

name: Cartel Tycoon: Anniversary Edition
description:
About Cartel Tycoon - Anniversary Edition includes:
- Cartel Tycoon
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - Guerillas DLC
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - La Familia DLC
- Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela DLC
- Artbook
- Soundtrack vol.I
- Soundtrack vol.II

name: Project Adam: AI Attack
description:
2222 AD,
Humanity will suffer destruction due to highly developed AI.

Adam, a special forces agent who survives, wakes up in a laboratory...
That place was the robots' giant space battleship 'Eden'.

Act like AI as much as possible,
Escape Eden from the eyes of AI!

name: CounterAttack: Uprising
description: CO-OP SHMUP / STG (Shoot em' up), 4 player local and 8 player online. Customize your ship with over 500 attachments while you blast through 32 levels.

name: Farm Land
description: Start your farming adventure! Take care of the plants, watch them grow and harvest the crops!

name: Galaxy Battle
description: Are you ready to become a legend among the stars? The galaxy awaits your command!

name: Haunted Zombie Slaughter 2
description: Part 2 of a single player top down game with a story about escaping zombies to survive! Play co-op with up to 2 players!

name: Humvee Assault: War 3D FPS
description: Its a 3D war game where player need to defeat all enemies.

name: Playroom Racer
description:
Small cars, big fun!
Playroom Racer is a 3D toy car racer for all ages.

name: Synergia: NextGen Edition
description: At the end of the world, love is sometimes the ultimate crime. Now remastered in high resolution, also featuring the SUNRISE expansion and bonus OST and in-game Artbook.

name: Viki Spotter: Complete Bundle
description: This is a set of puzzle games from the Viki Spotter series that will bring out all your attention.

name: Boykisser Mayhem

Each stage has at least 4 keys required to beat the stages, with a twist in each level to make them all a new experience. The game starts easy, and then quickly ramps up in difficulty from beginning to end, to post-end. Each stage contains a moon to find, and something else as well.

Can you get through all 14 stages and find all the secrets?

name: Helion
description: Are you ready to embark on an intergalactic journey like never before? Step into the thrilling world of "Helion," where tactical teamwork, role-based strategy, and stunning stylized graphics collide in an epic sci-fi adventure. Get ready to experience the future of team-based third-person shooters!

name: Luntik Learns Numbers
description: Curious Luntik invites girls and boys to fun counting lessons! Together with Luntik, other characters from the cartoon “Moon Guest” will find themselves at the epicenter of incredible events: the grasshopper Kuzya, the worm Korney Korneich and two hooligans - the caterpillars Pupsen and Vupsen. Favorite characters will challenge your child to complete a series of fun tasks to demonstrate their knowledge of numbers. If the baby fails to pass the test, he will have another, simpler one.

name: Paper Beast: Enhanced Edition
description:
Help this unique ecosystem and experience an extraordinary adventure!

Somewhere in the depths of Big Data, a new world has been born. A surreal land where life is just as rich and varied as on our own earth.

name: Luntik Knows the World
description:
Luntik invites the kids for a walk through a bright fairy-tale world!

Together with the inquisitive lunar guest and his friends, little players will visit meadows and fields, forests and lakes, learn the names of many animals, plants, birds and fish, learn to determine which category this or that object belongs to, and visit Kapa and Shera will get acquainted with the features of some professions.

For each topic, you need to complete several interesting tasks, and if the child fails, the heroes will offer him a simpler test. At the end of the baby's adventures, a surprise awaits you - a new series of cartoons about the adventures of the lunar guest, as well as a certificate as a World Knowledge Specialist.

name: Minna no Joushiki-ryoku TV
description: Minna no Joushiki Ryoku TV is a Wii video game released in 2008 by Nintendo and HAL Laboratory. It is a game that tests a person's general knowledge and has a goal of enhancing their grasp of information. There are a wide range of categories pertaining to geography, cooking, sports and more. There is an encyclopedia the player can view to gather even more information. The game is a quiz type game and whether or not you give the correct answer the game will give a good in-depth detail. Players can download even more explanations of answers by connecting to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.

name: Luntik Learns Letters
description: Our favorite character, as well as the favorite of many modern children, Luntik, invites all young children to go with him on an exciting journey, during which he will conduct very unusual reading lessons. If your child thinks that memorizing letters is a rather boring activity, then this game will definitely change his opinion by turning learning into an exciting game. General Sher, Little Bee, Kuzya and Mila will help Luntik teach your children to read.

name: Super Mario World: Neeberz's Hack
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Trux Arenas: Special Edition
description:
Only the most extreme racers would dare enter the enormous machines of Monster Trux Arenas: Special Edition. Wipe those grins off the other drivers' faces and strike fear in their hearts as you barrel along at top speeds. Use the Wii Remote to slide, steer and speed through environments that push your racing skills to the limit. Flatten your opponents' trucks or smash them into oblivion — just do what you can to keep them from dominating the arena. Take the championship prize with all the force you can muster.Pick the baddest vehicle in the lineup and get to work. From your perch high up in the truck of your choice, you'll see the other drivers careen out of control and flip off the course. Your high speed allows you to catch only a glimpse of the twisted wreckage as it bursts into flames. Keep pursuing vehicles and pick them off one by one to earn bigger trucks, upgrades, extra courses and other goodies. Tear up tracks made of mud and gravel while watching out for changing weather conditions that can worsen your position in a heartbeat. Enjoy the single-player Time Trial mode and International Arena Challenge or take on your friends in intense head-to-head competitions.

Unlock hidden extras including bigger trucks, upgrades and extra courses
Outstanding single player game modes including championships and challenges for the single racer
Challenge your friends in the multi-player mode
Utilizes the Wii control system for heart pounding excitement
Bump, smash and crash into other drivers

name: My Pet World
description: Make your favorite animals better again! The animals, your best friends, are sick and they need your care. With the help of enthusiastic veterinarians, you can solve real medical files. After your diagnosis, you give the animals the right treatment. Then you nurse the animals until they are strong enough to go home again. The fate of your favorite animals is in your hands. In brief: * More than 20 different animal species to take care of. * Diagnose, treat and monitor the animals as they recover. * 30 challenging medical records written by real vets. * You become a better vet and get more and more tools at your disposal. * Fully Dutch speaking

name: Oha Star Produce! Gentei Collabo Game Disc!!
description: A bonus game packaged with Japanese editions of We Cheer. Made from a collab with the children's daytime TV Show Oha Suta (Oha Star), and features music from the show.

name: Sengoku Basara 2: Heroes - Double Pack
description: Sengoku Basara 2 Heroes: Double Pack comes with Sengoku Basara 2 and Sengoku Basara 2 Heroes. The game sparked a major boom in tourism to the hometown of Katakura Kojūrō, Shiroishi City.

name: Speed 2
description: Speed 2 is, as the name suggests, all about speed! At these insane speeds the slightest mistake can end your career instantly, so prove yourself in the ‘amateur’ series and work your way up to the champion of the ‘professional’ series! Be faster and smarter than the competition, and if you just can’t learn how to properly take corners and build up speed, just smash them away since in Speed there are neither rules nor penalties!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Jolted Awake From a Winter Dream
description:
Version 1.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, featuring:
• New characters: Jingliu, Topaz & Numby and Guinaifen
• New main story quest
• New areas: Old Weapon Testing Ground and Pillars of Creation
• New companion missions
• New main event: Aetherium Wars
• …and more!

name: Spaghetti Western Shooter
description: Welcome to the Far West. Welcome to Colorado Death! A valley where you can meet bandits, Indians, gamblers and no-gooders, enjoy village fairs, help the townsfolk, and send the cowzombies back underground, collect gold, show off with damsels in distress... be a hero or a villain! - We control the sight, and making sure we load up at the right time, we by and large need to... shoot anything that moves. - Challenge 4 players at the same time! - 6 playable characters with different skills and different guns! - Sharpshooter career mode - for up to 4 players! - Move on the map and accept or reject a vast range of missions, to obtain Fame and raise in Rank! - 2 frenzies arcade modes! - Over 16 different shootout missions! - Combo shootouts for murderous shots! - Many Unlockable elements! - Save your best scores for every type of mission! - Easy to use, with in-game manual. - Splendid movies in cartoon rendering! - Western music score!

name: Spellbound Party
description: Spellbound Party offers a fun learning experience for the whole family. Take on friends and family in the ultimate spelling showdown in a crazy game show environment. Your host will take you on a rollercoaster ride of fun as you go head to head with up to 3 players in 'Party' mode. To give learning a competitive edge players are rewarded more points for choosing difficult words to spell. Children can also take on adults in Spellbound Generations mode where the spelling level is determined by the players' age. Features: * Choose from 8 avatars as well as slots for guest players * 4 Single Player modes: Championships, Training, Mini-Games, List of Shame * Up to 4 players can battle it out in the multiplayer Party Mode * Spellbound Generations mode offers a handicapping system allowing kids to compete against adults

name: Planet Basket 2009 2010
description: Experience in the Italian basketball championship with Planet Basket 2009/2010 , the video game with all the players, teams and official courts of the 2009/10 League. Travel the field with your favorite team to an exciting challenge with more rivals than ever; customize your favorite player for 1vs1 duels; Immerse yourself in the official championship to reach the game for the title, experience the thrill of the playoffs until the end!

name: Popstars
description: Become popstar has never been so easy! Take the microphone in your hand and charm the jury with your voice, so they can not help but choose you in the new band. In over 30 pop songs, it is necessary to show stunning performances! Create your own style! Create your age-ego according to your ideas and steal your competition with the show! Meet on your way to the Popstar from Popstars-Casting and the Recall, through the workshops to the grand finale on varied and atmospheric locations. Feel the exhausting nerve kitzel on your own body, if the critical jury judges about success or failure!

name: Truck Loader
description: Truck Loader is a classic puzzle game where you have to load cargo onto a truck with your magnetic arm. Boxes are spread across levels, and you have to collect them and load up the truck to complete the level.

name: Pro Golfer Saru
description: The Wii version of Golfer Ape is a golf game that reproduces the content of the original manga and animation. The original is a golf manga produced by Japanese cartoonist Fujiko Fujio A. The protagonist is often called "ape" because he looks like a monkey. In the game version, players have to compete with assassins organized by Shadow Golf in the natural environment. The various nirvana skills that appeared in the original work also have a very gorgeous performance in the game. Using the somatosensory operation of the Wii remote control, players will be able to experience a very realistic feeling of hitting the ball during the game.

name: Puzzle Series Vol. 1: Sudoku
description: "Sudoku", which is a hot topic all over the world, is finally coming to Wii. It is also interesting to play by choosing from 4 difficulty levels by yourself, and to challenge how many questions you can clear within the time limit. In addition, you can register up to 100 questions, so you can copy the questions in the newspaper and play with them, or you can create your own original questions. In addition, the two-player battle mode is also fulfilling. In "Point Battle", you can use the item panel, and you can play while bargaining, such as "chain" and "quick placement". In "speed battle", you compete for which one has cleared many problems in the same time. Of course, there is plenty of support for beginners. You can proceed while learning the rules in the hands-on tutorial.

name: Advanced Spanner-X: Endless Fire
description: Space shooter for Sharp.

name: Super Mario World: The Great Sixth
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Stories: Veterinaire
description: This Wii-game in 3D offers a perfect and realistic simulation of the No. 1 job of most children: Veterinarian! The player can handle over 30 different cases of animal patients that correspond to reality in a veterinary practice and have been developed by specialists in the field. A variety of different animal species needs medical attention, and the player must use all the techniques of a good veterinarian such as talking to the owners, analysis and diagnosis, treatment, surgery, control to heal the little darlings. Realistic diagnosis and treatment instruments are used, and as the experience grows, the player can even earn diplomas and distinctions in addition to the great satisfaction of his patients. The game offers three different levels of difficulty, plus a knowledge quiz with 150 questions. The game is using the Wii's own controller Wiimote and Nunchuck And allows a realistic immersion in the veterinarian world: the player can actively handle or operate animals, even in multiplayer, where two players can perform a complex treatment together.

name: The Anime Super Remix: Kyojin no Hoshi
description: Based on Star of the Giants (Kyojin no Hoshi), coming out alongside Ashita no Joe 2: The Anime Super Remix.

name: Nerf N-Strike: Double Blast Bundle
description: Electronic Arts and Hasbro's joint NERF N-Strike franchise for Wii, blends arcade style video game rail shooter action with classic NERF toy play that together are addictively fun for players of all ages. The NERF N-Strike Double Blast Bundle is the ultimate example to-date of why both video game and toy players can't get enough of Wii-based NERF N-Strike experience. Providing hours of adrenaline-charged NERF-style gameplay and fun, including multiplayer support, the bundle contains both video games NERF N-Strike and NERF N-Strike Elite on a single disc, as well as a Switch Shot Ex 3 blaster with Red Reveal decoder lens and launchable NERF darts.

name: New Unou Kids Wii
description: New Unou Kids Wii is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by IE Institute, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Monster Hearts R
description: Strange shooting game for PC.

name: Truck Loader 2
description: This is the second Truck Loader puzzle game, in which you have to load the truck with the boxes, using your robotic car. When moving you have to be very careful, because sometimes there may be very fragile items in the box.

name: Super Mario: Christmas Season
description: Sin descripción

name: Dactylus
description:
In Dactylus - a parallax-scrolling fantasy shooter - you slip into the role of Yarin, a dragon-rider. Evil forces destroyed his village and killed his family. Now it's up to you to take revenge.

Awaiting the player are 6-level-parallax scrolling, animated enemies, huge bosses, special weapons (like dragonfire and magical lightning) and multiple-choice conversations.

name: Oyako de Asobo: Miffy no Omocha-bako
description: Oyako de Asobo: Miffy no Omocha-bako; enjoy while communicating with your child using Wii. Play with Miffy in a world like a picture book! A fun mini-game will appear each time you play. Six elements for communication with children: 1. Twelve ways to change depending on how you proceed 2. Even if your child can't read the letters, the characters will speak and you will feel safe 3. 25 kinds of mini games like toys that can be enjoyed by even young children and small children 4. Enjoy playing with communication that matches your child's age, such as “Play together with your baby” and “Challenge with one child” 5. Reliable timer function that allows you to play time 6. In addition to “Play with Fun”, Miffy's “Play with Coloring” is also available.

name: Paint Works
description: Named after the classic quick guessing show on German television, Die Montagsmaler guarantees real creative fun for the whole family on the Wii. This makes it the first painting and creative game format on the motion console. It is all about drawing, guessing, painting and colouring. Whether alone or with up to four players - this game offers variety and pure entertainment. The party really gets going, especially in multiplayer mode: grab friends or family and off you go! Whoever guesses the searched terms first in the game »Monday Painter« wins the match. The game principle used is intuitive and ensures long-lasting guessing fun. But the single player mode is also impressive: Here the player draws figures, stamps or sprays crazy motifs. Features: * The first painting fun for the Wii: 14 different games about painting, drawing and colors * Let your creativity run free: Large creative part with paint boxes, mandalas and collages * Which one of you is the next Picasso? Gallery to save your own artworks * Also included: Over 500 terms for tracing and guessing are included with the game on extra playing cards. This is how »The Monday painter« becomes a real parlor game! * Dexterity, guesswork and creativity: For 1-4 players

name: Buddhagillie

description: Video game adaptation of the famous show of the same name, Pékin Express: La Route des Dragons is an adventure game on Wii which uses the principles of the game show. Follow a progression cut by stages, participate in the trials and try to win the immunity trials that allow you to achieve victory more easily.

name: Rilakkuma: Minna de Goyururi Seikatsu
description: In Rilakkuma: Minna de Goyururi Seikatsu, players can live free and leisurely lives with lazy bears. Not only can they change the decoration of the room, they can also take photos, and there are mini games to play. Every day in the game will reflect Wii's own time, real-world climate and weather, and seasonal information, allowing players to spend more time with the lazy bear every day. Various mini-games will appear on the bulletin board. Take photos according to the instructions to get props. The content of the problem is difficult to have. As long as you complete 4 questions, you can get a prop to decorate your room.

name: The Legend of Legacy: HD Remastered
description:
RPG fans rejoice as the classic adventure, The Legend of Legacy is remastered in HD!

The unique stories of 7 heroes spring to life as you explore the mystical land of Avalon and face unknown dangers along the way. Classic RPG gameplay has never felt more engaging with features such as battle formations, combat roles, and forging contracts to channel the power of elementals. An adventure unlike any other awaits you!

name: Mega Man X: Hard Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Man X: Soft-Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Phobos Massacre
description: A replacement for Episode 1 of DOOM, in E1 style. This wad is an attempt to capture the atmosphere of "Knee Deep in the Dead" and to evoke nostalgia in players who enjoyed the original DOOM levels.

name: Vordakk's Keep
description: This wad is a replacement for Map 01 of DOOM2, and is my attempt at a Plutonia-style level. Expect a very challenging adventure with some nasty battles and rather unfair ambushes, all in the spirit of The Plutonia Experiment.

name: Mega Man X: Tehe Man X
description: Sin descripción

name: ThinkSmart: Family!
description: A Puzzle Game for the whole family -Now the whole family can power up their minds and bodies And everyone can go head to head at your own level! -Over 8,000 exercises for well toned minds and bodies -Players establish their own “THINK” quotient and track their progress receiving expert evaluations throughout -Players can customize their own Avatars and enter the "Think Institute” to create their personalized daily plan -7 different categories: language comprehension, math, memory, logical and three-dimensional reasoning, readiness of mind and physical fitness -Includes puzzle games like Sudoku, Towers of Hanoi, Signal Boxes, Sort the Luggage and Mirror Image, absolutely free!" -Fun for up to 16 players in single and multi-player modes, Tournament, Competition and Endurance

name: Mega Man X: Hard-Type
description: Sin descripción

name: Titeuf: Le Film
description: Titeuf le Film on Wii is a compilation of mini-games intended for young players. Help Titeuf escape a surprise interrogation or survive a chase against his lifelong enemies.

name: U-Sing 2: Australian Edition
description: A version of U-Sing 2 that features Australian music.

name: Nodame Cantabile: Dream Orchestra
description: This is the first work in the "Symphony Lover's Dream Series" to land on the Wii. The game starts with a completely original story and takes you into a different world of "Symphony Lover's Dream". The songs appearing in the game are all well-known songs, this time we will use Wiimote to perform somatosensory performances! And it supports 4 people to play together at the same time!

name: The Voice: La Plus Belle Voix
description: A video game adaptation of the French version of The Voice.

name: La Voz
description: A video game adaptation of the Spanish version of The Voice.

name: La Voz Vol. 2
description: Sin descripción

name: La Voz Vol. 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Knight Windom XP
description:
Ultimate Knight Windom XP is a 2008 3D arena combat game featuring mecha inspired by various Windows and Linux operating systems originally developed by Y. Kamada for Microsoft Windows.

Windom XP supports singleplayer, local PVP, online PVP, and LAN PVP.

name: La Voz: Quiero tu Voz
description: Sin descripción

name: Mo Jie Qibing
description: Lord of the Rings bootleg Taiwanese game.

name: Strato-Spear
description: Strato-Spear is an 3d character action/hack and slash game, with freeform combos and movement. It is inspired by games like Devil May Cry and Super Smash Bros.

name: Pastel Island
description: Arcade collecting game.

name: Mario's Keytastrophe: Rebirth Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyan Nyan Tower
description: Doujin stage ascending game.

name: Dr. Mary
description:
Viruses Fighter is a classic minigame, in which you are playing as a doctor to kill the bacteria with different capsules.
Match four or more colors either horizontally or vertically to delete them. Each level is completed when all of the bacterias have been defeated.

name: HardBall
description:
Can you get the ball in the basket? It's NOT EASY, it's HARDBALL!
HardBall is a challenging puzzle game with simple swipe gameplay, suitable for all ages.

name: Magnate: Robot Idle Tycoon
description: Start at the bottom selling old machine parts and junk droids and... tap, tap, tap your way to your very own cyberpunk empire! Before you know it you’ll be able to hire managers to do the hard graft for you, and with billions banked, you must face the ultimate fat cat dilemma; take the path of GOOD or EVIL in your pursuit of even greater fortune?

name: Fall Ninja
description: Tap the screen left and right to rotate the board and navigate your Ninja through the puzzle landing on the other Ninja's and destroying them!

name: Taco Joe: Endless Taco Tosser
description: Joe is a simple man who loves nothing more than serving up delicious tacos and tossing them at an endless crowd of hungry customers!

name: The Swan Princess: Hidden Tales
description:
Your favorite princess is back with a new hidden objects game!
Help Odette, Derek, Alise, Uberta and Bromley in this new and exciting adventure! Win stars and find incredible secrets on this game!
Play your own story! Even if you don't beat a task, a brand new storyline can be opened only for you!

name: Zombiezz
description: Step into the undead frenzy of Zombiezz! Experience a one-of-a-kind retro arcade adventure where you obliterate hordes of zombies. With a top-down forced perspective, plunge into action-packed gameplay that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Can you survive the zombie onslaught and emerge as the ultimate survivor?

name: Hitstream
description:
Work up a sweat without even realising it as you punch, stretch, squat & step your way to fitness in this 360° game where challenges greet you from every angle.

Designed with positive energy & mental wellbeing in mind, Hitstream takes you to stunning locations across the globe, bringing the outdoor world to you, wherever you are.

Hit the targets, catch the orbs, dodge the walls, & meet the head rings.

This full-body workout comes with over 12 hours of choreographed gameplay across 3 difficulty levels plus random journey options, multiplayer, & both virtual & mixed reality environments, meaning Hitstream can be as different or familiar as you like each time you play.

Every action is perfectly timed to the beat of the music, with soundtracks that have been specially selected to take you on a range of journeys, from uplifting adventures that work on agility to hard-hitting routines that build strength & stamina.

Additional challenges await those who achieve a score of 90% or more -- can you make the grade?

Hitstream: the challenge surrounds you!

name: Tsumera
description: Taiwanese PC Pinball game.

name: Traumatarium
description: A randomly generated dungeon crawler in the style of Fighting Fantasy, featuring some of the most brutal 4 color dungeons!

name: Tenebrum
description: A heretic megawad containing total 35 levels, including secret levels. Intended to be played as a campaign. Also contains around 30 new monsters and 8 bosses.

name: Sinful Discharge
description: An episode for Heretic

name: Templum Dormiens Dei
description: A single level for Heretic, which requires ZDoom 2.8.1 or later. This map is meant to follow the events of Dark Deity's Bastion, and serve as an ending to the storyline which began with that level.

name: Shadowcaster
description: A 21st century Heretic episode covering many styles of level, both traditional and unusual as well.

name: Virtual Mom: Job Simulator Manager
description: You are a true superhero, balancing between raising children and a successful career. You'll have to overcome numerous challenges, starting from the moment the morning sun rises...

name: Reclamation
description: An ancient sanctuary has been corrupted by the minions of evil; reclaim the church and make the bastards pay.

name: Torture
description: Destroy the beasts controlling an underground dungeon; mutilate them as they have been mutilating your comrades.

name: Thief: The Trail of the Arch-Heretic
description: A moody, ambient WAD intended to put some of the feeling of "Thief: the Dark Project" into Heretic. It's a reworking of my own njthief WAD for Doom2.

name: Where Serpents Ever Dwell
description:
After the lifeless bodies of D'sparils body guards crumble and fall to the ground, for the first time in ages you feel a sense a sense of relief... as you enter the portal that finally takes you... home?

This is a challenging map for Heretic, and your gonna need to keep moving as well as taking full advantage of artifacts if you want to survive.

name: The Sewers of D'Sparil
description:
"Even underwater cities like D'Sparil's Dome need sewers"

A collection of speed maps made in 100 minutes.

name: Love Kuesuto
description: Take on the role of an old man whose life is flashing before his eyes. As you awaken, the goddess Aphrodite guides you through four game boards full of romantic trauma and relationship dilemmas.

name: The Crypts
description: This large map is a remake of E1M7 (The Crypts).

name: Foot Clinic
description:
Step into the shoes of a doctor and podiatrist as you indulge in the foot clinic experience. Scrub, scrape, pluck, and pull all kinds of feet.

Perform foot treatments for conditions like calluses, corns and ingrown toenails. Each patient presents a new problem, so you'll never get bored of your work!

name: The History of Fruit
description:
This is a 9 level Heretic wad designed for single/cooperative play.
In an epic turn of events, the Overlords of Fruit have rallied their unequaled forces of ferocity and badness and meanness and have struck back. It's up to the heretics to fight them back to the last bastion in The History of Fruit!

name: Water City
description: In the Dome of D'Sparil there is an ancient underwater city that has recently been taken over by the minions of the dark wizard. It is your responsibility to remove the foul presence of these evil creatures from this place! City of the Damned? That was mere practice compared to the beings you must face here!

name: Water Castle
description: This map is the sequel to Water City, and as such picks up where that map left off.

name: The Fiery Crater

name: X-Men: Mind Games
description:
The unreleased X-Men game for the 32X, known in later stages as X-Men: Mind Games. Although this is quite an elusive game concerning unreleased titles for the 32X, it has a lot to offer.

Development of this game was assigned to Scavenger, who owned some studios (like Zyrinx and Lemon) featuring many former Amiga demoscene developers, known for their high-tech profile and their enthusiasm into pushing systems to their limits.

This X-Men adventure with beat 'em up-esque gameplay is a 3D game with stunning visuals for its time, probably redefining a new age of titles for the Mega Drive add-on.

The prototype is quite early, something of a tech-demo which allows selecting and playing a couple levels from a concept title screen. The levels feature several playable areas -some of them having no enemies at all- and a single playable character, Bishop.

With this proto we have a great playable sketch of a game that could have probably surpassed our expectations, having been finished and released, that is. This is a great showcase for both the 32X and the Scavenger studios.

X-Men: Mind Games was never released.

Mr. Beluga is tired of the same daily routine and longs for something more. He looks forward to bedtime when he can close his eyes and dream of what he wants to do most of all: flying.

It's like Earth's equivalent of "George." But NASA heard that there might be boobs in space, so all the astronauts are eager to see boobs (all the men astronauts, that is), not realizing they're not women's boobs, but our little alien friend named Boobs. Your job as Boobs is to shoot down enemy rockets coming down the Van Doozy Corridor, the tunnel near Kerflunkydunk (enemy being Earth.) But beware of the falling stars and other aliens! The game combines tactics and strategy on one screen: dynamic PvP and PvE battles, capturing and retaining enemy buildings, increasing the size of the army and territorial influence, and even spell casting!

In this epic adventure you are to lead the Mushroom folks through this exciting and heroic journey across various planets!

name: 2048-F8
description:
This is the classic modern-day mobile puzzle game 2048. The aim is to create a block containing the number 2048. When you move the controls in a direction, the blocks will move in that direction until they hit another block or the edge of the grid.

When a moving block meets a stationary block of the same value, they combine to create a block with double the value, which clears space on the grid.

Every time you make a move a new block is randomly placed on the grid, usually this will be a 2 but sometimes can be a 4. Should the grid fill up and there are no adjacent blocks of the same value to combine, the game is over and you will need to press the reset button.

Game Modes:
2048 - the game finishes when you achieve a block with a value of 2048. Try and achieve this in the quickest time possible!
Long - the game continues until you create the largest block possible of 131,072 or there are no more moves available.
Time - you have three minutes to achieve the highest score you can.

name: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyoto Kurama Sansou Satsujin Jiken
description: Kyouto Anba Sansou Satsujin Jiken (京都鞍馬山荘殺人事件) is a murder mystery adventure game based on writings of Misa Yamamura, a Japanese writer of murder mystery novels. The protagonist of the story is Akiko Sonoyama (園山千晶), freelancer who finds herself in the middle of a murder mystery after the son of the host dies during the dinner right after drinking the wine. The game uses live-action videos and actors and shows the player protagonist in 3rd-person during investigation, similar to other games of such era, such as The Beast Within or Phantasmagoria 2. During gameplay, the full-screen videos appear in the center of the screen with surrounding window showing various action icons and game progress. While the player character appears during cut-scenes and dialogues, navigating environment is done using 1st-person perspective. During dialogues player has a list of questions one can ask with replies being a set of live-action videos of certain character addressing the player. 15 years after the 3DO game release, the PSP remake with the same title was released. The main difference there is that live actors have all been removed and characters were replaced with silhouettes and game interface changed to look like a mystery visual novel but with a selectable actions such as talk or inquire which make the game less of a typical visual novel and only resemble it in graphical presentation by using static backgrounds with dialogue text over it.

The main difference there is that live actors have all been removed and characters were replaced with silhouettes and game interface changed to look like a mystery visual novel but with a selectable actions such as talk or inquire which make the game less of a typical visual novel and only resemble it in graphical presentation by using static backgrounds with dialogue text over it.

name: 3D Genesis

You've chosen a side to fight for, and the enemy has been funneled into a deep crevice, but now you're outnumbered. You put their numbers to the test. They say the meek shall inherit the Earth, but how long can you defend it? This was originally planned to be 1 of 3 "3-D" games on Power-Play Arcade cart #1. A screenshot was shown in a catalog for Amiga's Power System, but no description was included. It was programmed by Dan McElroy and Jerry Lawson in 1983, shelved, and made available for limited release in 2010.

name: 3-D Zapper
description: Unreleased game programmed by Todd Marshall. Within existing internal documents the given title is "3-D Zapper," though the prototype cartridge itself has an end label that reads merely "3-D Demo," while the PCB within features a sticker reading "3D Space" and a date of December 13, 1982. Internal documents describe the game briefly as follows: "This game contains the elements of a typical shoot-em-up spree game. The unique elements of this game are: (1) that the invaders perform erratic randomized dances in a three-dimensional field. (2) The 3-D operation of the gun. (3) The invaders themselves are particularly tailored to provide an exciting 3-D effect on the ATARI VCS."

name: Pipe Line Puzzle
description:
Connect the complex pipes by rotating them!
This simple yet deep puzzle game lets you twist the panels and create a flowing water path by connecting the pipes.

The controls are easy - just touch the panel you want to rotate.
Find the start and end points of the pipes and keep connecting them by rotating.

Earn 1 to 3 stars based on your completion time and aim for 3 stars on all stages!

name: AndroMan on the Moon
description: Androman was a small white robot that would scurry about on a floor mat while the player controlled him using the Atari 2600. Androman also had a barcode scanner in his bottom that would read barcodes placed on the map so the 2600 (and the robot) knew where he was. Using a combination of the joystick and barcodes, the player could guide Androman around the floor mat and play various games. One of those games being Androman on the Moon.

name: Atom Smasher
description: A battle to the last atom! The Atomic Arena is where all sorts of nasty, burly life-forms come to contest each other in the galaxy's deadliest game! Armed with a regulation Atom Smasher Blaster, you must blast unstable atomic particles past your opponent and out of the arena, but if one hits you, it degrades your very atomic structure, and the results aren't pretty. But remember, someone else has the same goal...

name: Master Detective Archives: Rain Code - Ch. Halara: Raining Cats & Dog
description: The third DLC for Master Detective Archives: Rain Code is a substory that features protagonist Halara Nightmare, and allows players to control the Master Detective with the Forensic Forte "Postcognition."

name: Bionic Breakthrough
description: Bionic Breakthrough was one of only two games written to be used with the MindLink controller, a headband that the player wore on his head and plugged into the joystick port. The idea was that the MindLink's sensors would pick up any facial movements or muscle twitches the player would make. The problem was that the MindLink didn't work very well in initial test runs, and even when it did worked players would complain of headaches and dizziness from twitching their face. Bionic Breakthrough is really just Super Breakout with a title screen. It's unknown if this was just supposed to be a demo to show what the MindLink could do, or if it was actually a standalone product. Before the game starts there is a screen where the word MindLink slowly scrolls to the bottom, this is for callibration. On this screen the player can move the text block left and right to make sure the Mindlink is working properly. Bionic Breakthrough was never released.

description: HUMP mini (short for Heretic Upstart Mapping Project mini) is a 2018 Heretic mappack, an offshoot of Heretic Upstart Mapping Project from the previous year. It was led by HexenMapper, but unlike the preceding effort which was meant for GZDoom, HUMP mini is instead built with vanilla compatibility in mind.

name: Sosuria
description:
Sosuria is a map made for SOSU's birthday.

Sosuria is a proud, peaceful village on the island of Khshayarsha, full of life and hospitality. That is, until one day an evil sorcerer ransacked the land with his army, taking most of the goods and resources for himself and turning the island into an uninhabitable volcanic landscape. Legend has it that a mythical being of wonder dwells in Sosuria's largest and most prominent building, the Temple of the Ancients. It is said that this creature has the ability to turn back time and undo the evil that was dealt to the village. There is only one way to find out if this is true...

name: Wrath of the Titans

It includes 8 revised editions of ETTiNGRiNDER's prior released ﻿maps to update the visuals and gameplay, plus 1 never before released one (E2M2)

name: Blood, Fire, Death
description: You Akroxs, the archimagus of fire and ice. Long time ago you have called great demons, masters of fire for yourself in a service, in exchange for the soul. But when payment time has come, you have not wished to give the most valuable that is at you. And you have gone to their house to win them and not to be more dependent on them. Whether you will to win them? Or you will for ever doom the soul to a fiery torment?

name: Burial Ground
description: You've been lost in the forest for days. In the middle of the night you awaken to weird sounds coming from the distance. You douse your campfire and head toward the sounds to investigate. You're greeted by a craggy gate and moonlit headstones. You hear a slight rustling, then the silence is broken by the sound of heavy footsteps coming toward you. Looks like you won't be getting much sleep tonight.

name: Dark Mountain
description: A graveyard is being harvested of corpses to create undead warriors. Fight your way into the caverns beneath the mountain to destroy the evil inhabitants.

name: Desert Crypt
description: While traveling through a desert region, you are ambushed and knocked unconscious by a group of golems. You wake up to find yourself inside a sarcophagus. You push the lid of off the coffin and climb out. You hear the sounds of stone debris being piled up outside the entrance to the tomb. They are sealing you in. At your feet you notice your crossbow. Whoever has put you in here has tossed your weapon on the tomb floor to be sealed in with you. You force the door open and begin fighting your way out of the crypt...

name: The Komainu Quest
description: Promotional game for the town of Seto.

name: The Forgotten Portals
description: You're making your way through an icy region and are nearly crushed when some ice caverns collapse. Eventually you make your way out only to find yourself trapped in a long deserted temple complex. The gates are enchanted and cannot be opened. You decipher an inscription that tells you that you must pass through three portals to remove the barriers that will allow you to leave.

description: The Indespensible T_DUNNxx.WAD Series - For Heretic is a single-level PWAD for Heretic designed by Travers Dunne and Alister Dunne and released in 1997.

name: Dark Mountain II
description: Sequel to "Dark Mountain" (darkmtn.wad). This is a very large level with more detail in many places than the original Heretic engine can handle.
